CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Case_Deadline__c <= TODAY(), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"))), IMAGE(" /img/samples/light_red.gif","RED",20,40), IF(AND(Case_Deadline__c - TODAY()=1, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"))), IMAGE(" /img/samples/light_yellow.gif","YELLOW",20,40), IF(AND(Case_Deadline__c - TODAY() >1, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed"))), IMAGE(" /img/samples/light_green.gif","GREEN",20,40),"")))
CustomField.label: Deadline color
